name: Call to Power II
description: Prepare to accept history's greatest challenge: build the world's most powerful empire over a span of 6,300 years.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 7 Compatible 3D Card DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible 3D Card DirectX: Version 9.0
